name: Gazing Demise
flavorText: The eyes of fallen warriors peer into the darkness to see what you cannot.
flavorTextHtml: The eyes of fallen warriors peer into the darkness to see what you cannot.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%
Increases Mana Regeneration by [12.00 - 14.00] per Second
primary.text: Increases Mana Regeneration by [12.00 - 14.00] per Second

secondary.textHtml: The damage of Spirit Barrage is increased by 120%. Spirit Barrage gains the Phantasm rune which lasts twice as long, and the attack rate from Manitou spectres is increased. [100 - 150]%
